title: For the purpose of calculating the FSI, the entire area of the plot excluding area under Development Plan roads / Regional Plan Roads and Development Plan reservations, if any, shall be considered
clause_text: For the purpose of calculating the FSI, the entire area of the plot excluding area under Development Plan roads / Regional Plan Roads and Development Plan reservations, if any, shall be considered.
section: Buildings Abutting Two or More Streets
